INSERT INTO hotPlaces (writer_id, title, content, latitude, longitude, location, place_name, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{writerId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{location}, #{placeName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT hp.id, hp.writer_id, m.nickname, m.profile_image, m.introduction, hp.title, hp.content, hp.created_at, hp.view_count, hp.like_count, hp.latitude, hp.longitude, hp.location, hp.place_name, hp.start_date, hp.end_date FROM hotPlaces hp JOIN members m ON hp.writer_id = m.id WHERE hp.id = #{id}

SELECT hp.id, hp.writer_id, m.nickname, m.profile_image, m.introduction, hp.title, hp.content, hp.created_at, hp.view_count, hp.like_count, hp.latitude, hp.longitude, hp.location, hp.place_name, hp.start_date, hp.end_date FROM hotPlaces hp JOIN members m ON hp.writer_id = m.id
ORDER BY hp.id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{listsize};
